column5: I feel the exact same way

Damn your smart for a 16yo. Everyone says suicide isn’t an option but the truth is their is no option and i have fake fucking junkee friends too and the family part is the reason i say that killing myself is selfish. If i forget about them nothing is holding me back nothing and i have just given up on life. I didn’t ask to be born i didn’t want any of this shit. What is beautiful about life ? Traveling ? Eating ? Clothes ? Meeting ppl ? Nothing makes me happy everything is about money, working, school, being bullied because some assholes think they are superior too you. In my eyes suicide is the option because then you don’t have to live you don’t exist anymore and all of your pain is gone. I gave this women everything and will never be able to love or trust again.

I have nothing to lose my gf left me she was the most precious thing i have now i have no one. Every job i did was shit, school was shit. Life is shit i’m depressed everyday even when i was with her i was depressed every day and no one gives a fuck around me i can’t talk to anyone and killing myself would probably be the most selfish thing i habe ever done in my life but i don’t care anymore i don’t wanna be alibe anymore i don’t wanna suffer anymore i just want to die and i’m gonna do it i have nothing to lose nothing i really wanna die.

Same except i’m ready to be selfish for once in my life and just do it and do it for myself i’m so tired of this and i can’t do it anymore and this is really serious i’m ready to do it and be selfish because i have nothing to lose
